posts.message: My husband wanted to buy the Samsung 4K curve tv against my preference (we are traditionally a SONY family) but I must say that it is quite exceptional and the picture is undeniably real. I can safely say after one month, I am spoiled and know I will have difficulty watching anything else!
Owned it two months and still haven't used all the features! The pictures is absolutely amazing! All the Smart TV services are overwhelming! Spectacular center piece for our new living room!
I like this curve even I'm sitting on the side and I can still see it as if I'm in front of my tv. Hope they lower the price so I can by for my loft
